title: Hacked for 3 days and no help from riot?
body: My account has someone unauthorized logging into it and playing RANKED games as well as spending all my blue essence. I need to change my password but the email that is linked to this account has been deactivated. I have tried to contact someone to help with this issue but have received nothing? Please I really need to stop this person from ruining my experience and every time i try to queue for a game i get kicked off with a message that someone has logged in from another computer :( HELP
